name: Stuck Inside (OILSLICC)
description:
So this is a game made for the Brakeys 2022.1 game jam which had the theme of it is not real, which I translated to my personal struggles with anxiety and how it is predominantly in my head. However, you may notice that it is not a part of said jam, this is because on the final day before I could submit there was a major power outage in my area which lasted 3 days, thus preventing me from submitting the game. Anyway, I hope you enjoy the game never the less, feedback of any sort is always appreciated, and if you are suffering with mental health in any way, I would heavily advice seeking professional medical help. And just remember that you are enough.

Controls:

arrows to move

z to jump

x to dash
